actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill entitled "The French Pete Wilderness Act of 1977".

summary.text: Designates specified lands known as French Pete Creek in the Willamette National Forest, Oregon, as wilderness to be administered by the Secretary of Agriculture. Incorporates such lands into the Three Sisters Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill entitled "The French Pete Wilderness Act of 1977".
